There are six groups of consciousness, namely eye-consciousness, ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, and mind-consciousness.
These six groups of consciousness are either wholesome, unwholesome, obscured indeterminate, or unobscured indeterminate.

As for the bonds, latent afflictions, secondary afflictions, and entanglements associated with wholesome eye consciousness, how many are said to be associated and how many are said to be unassociated?

As for the bonds, latent afflictions, secondary afflictions, and entanglements associated with unwholesome, obscured-neutral, and unobscured-neutral eye consciousness, how many are said to be associated and how many are said to be unassociated?
Eye consciousness is the same as ear, nose, tongue, and body consciousness.
As for wholesome eye consciousness, all bonds, fetters, latent afflictions, secondary afflictions, and entanglements are said to be unassociated.
As for unwholesome eye consciousness, there are three bonds, three fetters, three latent afflictions, seven secondary afflictions and entanglements, which are said to be associated.

He said:
No, it is not so.
As for unwholesome eye consciousness associated with craving, there are two bonds, two fetters, two latent afflictions, six secondary afflictions and entanglements, which are said to be associated.
Just as with the unwholesome eye consciousness associated with greed, so it is with the unwholesome eye consciousness associated with hatred.
In the obscured neutral eye consciousness, there are two fetters, two bonds, two latent afflictions, and four entanglements, which are said to be associated.
In the unobscured neutral eye consciousness, all fetters, bonds, latent afflictions, secondary afflictions, and entanglements are said to be non-associated.
As with eye consciousness, so it is with ear, nose, tongue, and body consciousness.
The difference here is that nose consciousness and tongue consciousness should not be said to have obscured neutrality.
In wholesome mental consciousness, all fetters, bonds, latent afflictions, secondary afflictions, and entanglements are said to be non-associated.
In unwholesome mental consciousness, there are seven fetters, seven bonds, thirty-four latent afflictions, and thirty-nine secondary afflictions and entanglements, which are said to be associated.
Is it one mind?
He said:

In the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of wrong view to be eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering, there are two fetters, two bonds, and two latent tendencies;
If in the state of being awake, it should be said that it is associated with six secondary afflictions and entanglements;
If in the state of sleep, it increases the seventh latent tendency.

Just as in the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of wrong view to be eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering, so it is in the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendencies of attachment to views, attachment to precepts and vows, doubt, craving, hatred, and pride to be eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering.
In the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of the unique ignorance to be eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering, there is one fetter, one bond, and one latent tendency;
If in the state of being awake, it should be said that it is associated with five secondary afflictions and entanglements;
If in the state of sleep, it increases the sixth latent tendency.

In the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of wrong view to be eliminated by seeing the truth of the origin of suffering, there are two fetters, two bonds, and two latent tendencies;
If in the state of being awake, it should be said that it is associated with six secondary afflictions and entanglements;
If in a state of sleep, the seventh, drowsiness, is added.

Just as in the case of unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of wrong view abandoned by the path of seeing the truths of origination, so too is it in the case of unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendencies of attachment to views, doubt, craving, hatred, and conceit.

In the case of unwholesome mental consciousness associated with the latent tendency of ignorance that is not shared by the two vehicles, there is one fetter, one bond, and one latent tendency.

If in the state of sleep, the sixth sleep is increased.

If in the state of awakening, it should be said that it is associated with six secondary afflictions and entanglements;

In the unwholesome consciousness associated with the latent tendency of non-shared ignorance to be eliminated by cultivation, there is one fetter, one bond, and one latent tendency;
If in the state of awakening, it should be said that it is associated with five secondary afflictions;
If in the state of sleep, the sixth sleep is increased.

In the case of the defiled indeterminate consciousness associated with the latent tendency of craving abandoned by cultivation in the form realm, there are two fetters, two bondages, two latent tendencies, and four secondary afflictions and entanglements, which should be said to be associated.

As with the defiled-neutral mind in the form realm, the defiled-neutral mind in the formless realm is also like this.
